segment.source: Windows containers provide operating system level virtualization that allow you to run multiple isolated applications on one container host.
segment.target: Windows containers provide operating system level virtualization that allow you to run multiple isolated applications on one container host.

segment.source: The following table list topics that provide more information about Windows containers, a guided quick start so that you can try out Windows containers, and additional resources.
segment.target: The following table list topics that provide more information about Windows containers, a guided quick start so that you can try out Windows containers, and additional resources.

segment.source: The following resources will walk you through the deployment, creation, and simple management of Windows Containers.
segment.target: The following resources will walk you through the deployment, creation, and simple management of Windows Containers.
